def calculate_minimum_redirect_cost(n, roads):
    g = [[0] * (n + 1) for _ in range(n + 1)]
    d = [[0] * (n + 1) for _ in range(n + 1)]
    for (a, b, c) in roads:
        g[a][b] = c
        g[b][a] = c
        d[a][b] = c
        d[b][a] = -c
    ans = 0
    tot = 0
    stack = [1]
    visited = [1]
    while stack:
        t = stack.pop()
        for i in range(1, n + 1):
            if i not in visited and g[t][i] > 0:
                stack.append(i)
                visited.append(i)
                tot += g[t][i]
                if d[t][i] < 0:
                    ans += -d[t][i]
                break
    if d[visited[-1]][1] < 0:
        ans += -d[visited[-1]][1]
    tot -= g[visited[-1]][1]
    visited.append(1)
    if ans > tot - ans:
        ans = tot - ans
    return ans
